name: Project Kiss Kiss Unofficial Demo 2
description: Project Kiss Kiss is an ongoing game im working on the games not supposed to be good its actually just something for me to do when im bored if you see this game or find it randomly please share it with as much people as possible consider this the Project Kiss Kiss challenge im going to keep working on it for awhile longer now since the demo 1 version is old and this isnt the real demo 2 so have fun forcing friends to play it
